New Records: India recorded its highest PowerPlay score in T20 World Cup 2024
India beat Bangladesh by 50 runs in the T20 World Cup 2024 Super Eight match
Key Match Events: Kuldeep Yadav took 3 wickets for 20 runs
Arshdeep Singh took 2 wickets for 17 runs
Jasprit Bumrah took 2 wickets for 20 runs
Pre-Game Insights: Bangladesh won the toss and opted to bowl first
Najmul Hossain Shanto said they would like to restrict India to a small total and that is the plan
Rohit Sharma said they wanted to bat and that's what they got
Rohit Sharma said looks like a good wicket and depends on how much the sun is beating down and making the pitch slow
Post-Match Reflections: India moved closer to semifinals with convincing win over Bangladesh
India will qualify for the semifinals if Australia beats Afghanistan on Sunday
Rohit Sharma said it's a good win and we're moving in the right direction
Virat Kohli said it was a good team effort and we're happy with the win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The highest score at the Sir Vivian Richards Stadium in Antigua is 196/5 by India
The average first innings score at the Sir Vivian Richards Stadium in Antigua is 132.83* for 20-over matches
India has won all 4 matches against Bangladesh in the T20 World Cup
Others: The match was played at the Sir Vivian Richards Stadium in Antigua
The match was part of the T20 World Cup 2024 Super Eight stage
